ellis.image.processing
Class ImageUtilities

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ellis.image.processing.ImageUtilities
public class ImageUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of static Image to BufferedImage and double[][] conversion and manipulation utilities.

See Also:
ImageUtilities, ImageViewArea, JScrollPane

Method Detail

waitForImage

public static boolean waitForImage(java.awt.Image image)

Waits for an image to be loaded into memory. This method blocks.

NOTE - This method is modeled after code in Java 2D Graphics by Jonathan B. Knudsen
Parameters:
image - an Image to be loaded
Returns:
boolean indicating if the Image was loaded

createBufferedImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createBufferedImage(java.awt.Image image)

Creates a BufferedImage from an Image. This method blocks.

NOTE - This method is modeled after code in Java 2D Graphics by Jonathan B. Knudsen

Parameters:
image - an Image to be loaded
Returns:
BufferedImage the converted Image

createBufferedImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createBufferedImage(java.awt.Image image,
                                                               int imageType)

Creates a BufferedImage from an Image. This method blocks.

NOTE - This method is modeled after code in Java 2D Graphics by Jonathan B. Knudsen

Parameters:
image - an Image to be loaded
imageType - one of the standard BufferedImage types such as BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB
Returns:
BufferedImage the converted Image

getGrayFromRGB

public static int getGrayFromRGB(int argbPackedPixel)

Converts a packed argb int pixel into a single averaged int value. This is done by bit shifting the rgb values, summing, and dividing by three. The transparency information is discarded.

Parameters:
argbPackedPixel - the packed pixel colors
Returns:
int the average color value

getRGBFromGray

public static int getRGBFromGray(int grayPixel)

Converts an int pixel into a packed argb value. This is done by bit shifting the int value into rgb values. The transparency bits are set to 0xff.

Parameters:
grayPixel - the gray value
Returns:
int the packed pixel colors

getMinMax

public static int[] getMinMax(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bufferedImage)

Determines the average color maximum and minimum values of a rgb type BufferedImage.

Parameters:
bufferedImage - the BufferedImage
Returns:
int[] an array of size 2 with the first value being the min and the second being the max

getMinMax

public static double[] getMinMax(double[][] source)

Determines the maximum and minimum values in a double[][] array..

Parameters:
source - the source data
Returns:
double[] an array of size 2 with the first value being the min and the second being the max

getDataFromBufferedImage

public static double[][] getDataFromBufferedImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage source)

Used to convert between a rgb type BufferedImage and a double[][] array. Color information is lost by averaging.

Parameters:
source - the BufferedImage
Returns:
double[] the averaged color representation of the BufferedImage
